findings.title: Honeypot risk
findings.description: The contract owner may contain the authority to modify the transaction tax. If the transaction tax is increased to more than 49%, the tokens may not be able to be traded.

findings.title: Hidden Mint Function
findings.description: Hidden mint functions may increase the amount of tokens in circulation and effect the price of the token.

findings.title: Common form of scam: You buy the token, but it's disappearing from your wallet
findings.description: The contract owner can have the authority to modify the balance of tokens at other addresses. For example revoke the bought tokens from the holder's wallet.

findings.title: Honeypot Risk
findings.description: The contract blocks sell transfer from holder wallet, and multiple events may cause honeypot. Trading disabled, extremely high tax.

findings.title: Farming
findings.description: If there is a function for this Developer can set zero fee or no max wallet size for addresses (for example team wallets can trade without fee. Can cause farming)
